attributes.action: Give end of year bonuses to those who have worked through the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Those who have continued to work through the pandemic have been significantly over-worked, with many being isolated to working from home. Some have even had to educate their children and do a full-time job. This is the group in society silently suffering and receiving no recognition.
attributes.background: Give an end-of-year bonus to every person who has continued to work full time since March.

rejection.details: End of year bonuses are a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition asking for the Government to introduce a one off tax rebate for people who have worked throughout the pandemic, if that's something that you'd like to see.
